description: System-generated unique identifier for this row, used as the primary key and for joins.
Audit datetime when the row was created or last modified, stored as YYYYMMDDHHMMSSmmm; timezone/source system may need confirmation.
Boolean flag marking alternative fuel classification for compliance and reporting.
Human-readable product or service description shown on fueling and purchase records.
Short product/service code used in transactions and integrations to reference this item.
Default unit price for this item; likely per gallon or unit and currency unspecified; confirm with SME.
Cross-reference identifier from a legacy system for migration or mapping purposes.
Name of the originating table in the legacy system associated with this record.
Indicates whether the item is inactive and should be excluded from new transactions.
